item.title: (Mini) Road Cycling Training Camp - Costa del Sol
item.description: Where to stay Where to get your bike from Where to ride I recently went on a little (Mini) Training Camp / Holiday in Benalm√°dena (near M√°laga, Costa del Sol) and thought I would share my experience here. Somebody may find this useful ü§î .. Where to stay As nice as it is to stay close to the beach and perhaps go for a nice little walk or sunbathing session after a hard day in the saddle, one thing to be aware of is that the Costa del Sol is very built-up.

item.title: Shapefiles in R with ggplot2 & rgdal
item.description: This quick tutorial will show you the very basics of using Shapefiles in R to generate maps with ggplot2 and rgdal. Along the way, we will create a Hospital Density Map for Scotland as the one below: Before We Start Geospatial data files aren‚Äôt necessarily free, in fact, a lot of service providers charge a handsome amount of money for them (after all, the generation of these files takes time, effort and money).

item.title: About
item.description: Hi folks.. I am a Life Scientist turned Information Analyst with an interest in programming, cycling and beer. I am new to the blogging business so not sure how I will fare with it.. However, you can find some of my other musings on one of the following platforms:

item.title: Maze Generator √† la Shiffman
item.description: I am a big fan of Daniel Shiffman‚Äôs work and particularly like his YouTube channel Coding Challenges. One of the ‚Äúchallenges‚Äù is the creation of a Maze Generator using p5.js, the JavaScript implementation of the Processing language/package. In this short article you can find my implementation of the Maze Generator √† la Shiffman. Run the Maze Generator below or head down to view the code. Maze Generator Hosted on OpenProcessing.

item.title: Publications
item.description: 2018 Alcohol-Related Hospital Statistics Scotland 2017/18 2015 Potential of faba bean starch for distilled spirit production Enhancing the economic potential of beans using Vicia faba L.: Crop performance and the use of air-classified grain components in animal feeds and brewing 2018 Alcohol-Related Hospital Statistics Scotland 2017/18 Authors: R Lawder, R Gordon, M Moench Abstract: This publication provides an annual update to figures on the alcohol-related inpatient and day case activity taking place within general acute hospitals and psychiatric hospitals in Scotland.
